WorkItem.Description:
getCalculatedValue() with LEN function causes script to stop
 
Test:
----
$PHPExcel = new PHPExcel();
$ws = $PHPExcel->getActiveSheet();
$ws->getCell('A1')->setValue('=LEN("Hello")');
 
var_dump($ws->getCell('A1')->getCalculatedValue());
// script stops here without any warning messages
 
 
Expected result:
----
int(5)
 
Actual result:
----
nothing
 
Environment:
----
PHPExcel: Latest source from SVN (1.6.3+)
